scripts.build: npm run build -w @minatokens/api && npm run build -w @minatokens/storage && npm run build -w @minatokens/token && npm run build -w @minatokens/upgradable && npm run build -w @minatokens/nft  && npm run build -w @minatokens/abi
scripts.build:docs: rm -rf packages/api/docs/api && rdme docs:prune packages/api/docs --confirm && npm run docs -w packages/api && node scripts/build-docs.js && rdme docs packages/api/docs && rdme docs packages/token/docs
scripts.clean: rm -rf cache && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build
scripts.compile:devnet: CHAIN=devnet node --trace-uncaught --loader=ts-node/esm --enable-source-maps --test scripts/compile.ts && npm run build -w @minatokens/abi
scripts.compile:mainnet: CHAIN=mainnet node --trace-uncaught --loader=ts-node/esm --enable-source-maps --test scripts/compile.ts && npm run build -w @minatokens/abi
scripts.compile: npm run compile:devnet && npm run compile:mainnet
